T02D2488:197b-1: badzra y'a na m'u la patti t'i k'a /
T02D2488:197b-3: rdo rje theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher bshad pa /
T02D2488:197b-4: 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2488:197b-5: rtag gnas dus gsum bde gshegs mnyam nyid sku //
T02D2488:198a-0: kha sbyar bde chen longs spyod yongs @198a * //
T02D2488:198a-2: bdud bzhi las rgyal 'gro kun re 'dod skong //
T02D2488:198a-3: thugs rje bdag nyid 'jam mgon phyag 'tshal te //
T02D2488:198a-4: 'dir ni mi mkhas gsang sngags don la mngon rmongs pa'i //
T02D2488:198a-5: dbang bskur dam tshig med de zhal gyi bdud rtsi bral //
T02D2488:198a-6: bdud kyis mngon bslus rang nyid phung ba kho nar zad //
T02D2488:198a-7: snying rje gso thabs bdud rtsi 'di ni bshad par bya //
T02D2488:198a-8: lam mchog rnams kyi gzhir 'gyur dam tshig 'di //
T02D2488:198a-9: theg mchog rgyud kun las ni rab bstan pa //
T02D2488:198a-10: slob dpon gzhan dag gzhan du 'chad de 'di yi don //
T02D2488:198a-11: bdag gis bla ma las rnyed theg mchog spyod pa nyon //
T02D2488:198a-12: de la gsang sngags kyi tshul spyod pa rnams kyis
T02D2488:198a-13: skye ba med pa'i rgyud khong du chud par bya
T02D2488:198a-14: ste / 'gro ba thams cad snying rjes bsgral ba'i
T02D2488:198a-15: sems sngon du btang ba thig le chen po yongs
T02D2488:198a-16: su rdzogs par 'dod pas mtshan nyid dang ldan pa'i
T02D2488:198a-17: slob dpon ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor mngon sum
T02D2488:198a-18: ste / du snang pa'am / gzhon nu ma la phab ste dkyil 'khor 'dri ba'am /
T02D2488:198a-19: yang na de nyid bcu dang ldan pas mngon du bris pas bum pa'i dbang dang /
T02D2488:198a-21: shes rab ye shes kyi dbang dang /
T02D2488:198a-22: yongs su rdzogs pa'i cho ga dang ldan pa'i slob
T02D2488:198a-23: ma la slob dpon gyis rtsa ba'i dam tshig pham
T02D2488:198a-31: dam tshig gi tshogs rnams dpog par bya'o //
T02D2488:198a-32: de nas bskyed pa'i rim pa dang rdzogs pa'i tshul
T02D2488:198a-33: gyis bsgrubs na cho gcig la sogs pas mchog gi
T02D2488:198a-34: dngos grub dang / thun mong gi dngos grub rnams zhar la rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2488:198a-35: de nas lhun gyis grub pa'i don thob nas dmigs
T02D2488:198a-36: pa med pa'i snying rje chen pos rtog pa med
T02D2488:198a-37: par sems can gyi don byed pa ni gsang sngags
T02D2488:198a-39: / gzhan dag rdo rje rtse mo'i rgyud la sogs
T02D2488:198a-40: pa bya ba spyod pa gtso bor gyur pa las
T02D2488:198a-41: kyang / gnyis su med pa'i don khong du chud
T02D2488:198a-42: cing dam tshig can gyi skye bos brtags pa'i lha
T02D2488:198a-43: dang ye shes kyi lha dang dbang po'i sgo mnyam
T02D2488:198a-44: kyang / par sbyar nas / dka' thub dang /
T02D2488:198b-0: dka' sbyang dang @198b khrus la sogs pa'i las dang
T02D2488:198b-1: bya ba gtsor mi 'dzin par 'grub par gsungs te
T02D2488:198b-3: khrus dang gtsang spra 'dir mi dgos //
T02D2488:198b-4: dka' thub dka' spyad 'dir mi dgos //
T02D2488:198b-5: sangs rgyas rnams dang sems dpa' che //
T02D2488:198b-8: gzhan yang thig le mnyam gnas kyi rgyud las /
T02D2488:198b-9: bde ba chen po'i ngang gnas na //
T02D2488:198b-10: dam tshig med cing sdom pa 'ang med //
T02D2488:198b-11: bya dang byed ba rtsol ba med //
T02D2488:198b-14: byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2488:198b-15: byang chub sems la mnyam gnas na //
T02D2488:198b-16: dam tshig sdom pa nyams ma yin //
T02D2488:198b-18: thugs gsang ba'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D2488:198b-19: spros med thig le'i dang gnas na //
T02D2488:198b-20: bya ba ma yin spyad kyang 'grub //
T02D2488:198b-22: rtog pa yongs su zad pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D2488:198b-23: dam tshig la sogs brtags pas 'ching //
T02D2488:198b-24: sgyu ma'i sbyor shes stong pas 'grub //
T02D2488:198b-26: mkha' 'gro ma gsang ba mdzod las kyang /
T02D2488:198b-27: 'di ltar snang ba'i dngos po rnams //
T02D2488:198b-28: sgyu ma lha dang lha mor gnas //
T02D2488:198b-29: bsdam bya med cing sdom byed med //
T02D2488:198b-30: rtsa dang rlung dang thig le med //
T02D2488:198b-33: gzhan yang rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud thams cad las kyang /
T02D2488:198b-34: bde ba chen po'i don rtogs na //
T02D2488:198b-35: smyung bar gnas pa la sogs pa //
T02D2488:198b-36: dman pa'i spyod pa bshad pas na zab mo'i don
T02D2488:198b-37: rdo rje theg pa rnams kyis ni rang bzhin gyis
T02D2488:198b-38: gnas pa'i lha'i sbyor bas rtag par thig le chen
T02D2488:198b-39: po mnyam pa nyid la gnas na /
T02D2488:198b-40: dngos grub kyi mchog sku gsum ye shes lnga la sogs pa thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2488:198b-41: gzhan dag bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud rdo rje theg pa ma yin nam /
T02D2488:198b-42: de dag las ni las dang bya bas 'grub par bshad na /
T02D2488:198b-43: gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams las
T02D2488:198b-44: kyang sbyin pa la sogs pa bsod nams kyi chogs
T02D2488:198b-45: kyis thams cad mkhyen pa rgyu'i gtso bo zhes gsungs
T02D2488:198b-47: de dag ni bcom ldan 'das kyis dgongs te bshad pa yin no //
T02D2488:199a-2: spros bcas la dga' ba dang /
T02D2488:199a-3: shin tu zab mo'i don la 'jigs pa rnams nye bar gzung ba'i phyir gsungs pa yin no //
T02D2488:199a-5: gsang sngags kyi don la de kho na nyid la 'jug pa las /
T02D2488:199a-6: stong nyid lta bas grol 'gyur te //
T02D2488:199a-7: sgom pa lhag ma de don yin //
T02D2488:199a-8: lus ngag yid kyi spyod pa kun //
T02D2488:199a-9: theg pa dman la bstan pa yin //
T02D2488:199a-11: slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas kyang /
T02D2488:199a-12: de nyid tshol la thog mar ni //
T02D2488:199a-13: thams cad yod ces smra bar bya //
T02D2488:199a-14: don rnams rtogs shing chags med la //
T02D2488:199a-15: phyis ni rnam par dben don nyid //
T02D2488:199a-17: gzhan du 'jam dpal sgyu 'phrul dra ba las kyang /
T02D2488:199a-18: lag na rdo rje ngas sems can rnams kyi blo'i khyad par dang /
T02D2488:199a-19: rigs kyi bye brag gis theg pa'i khyad par rnams bstan te /
T02D2488:199a-20: la la la phyi rol pa'i tshul lo //
T02D2488:199a-21: la la la nyan thos kyi theg pa'o //
T02D2488:199a-22: la la la rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa dang /
T02D2488:199a-23: gzhan yang pha rol tu phyin pa'i theg pa dang /
T02D2488:199a-24: rig pa 'dzin pa'i rgyud dpag tu med pa bstan kyang /
T02D2488:199a-25: theg le chen po yi ge med pa brda dang
T02D2488:199a-26: bral bas gnyis su med pas sangs rgyas par rig
T02D2488:199a-27: par bya'o zhes gsungs pas gsal bar byas pas rig
T02D2488:199a-28: par bya'o // gzhan yang rdo rje rtse mo la sogs pa'i khungs dang /
T02D2488:199a-29: rdo rje gtsug tor las kyang /
T02D2488:199a-30: de kho na la mnyam gnas na //
T02D2488:199a-31: dam tshig med cing sngar spyad med //
T02D2488:199a-32: rdo rje dril bu gzung mi dgos //
T02D2488:199a-35: shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa las kyang /
T02D2488:199a-36: rab 'byor byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sbyin pa
T02D2488:199a-37: la sogs pa rnams ni spros ba dang bcas pa
T02D2488:199a-38: ste mtshan mar rig par bya'o //
T02D2488:199a-39: don dam pa ni chos kyi dbyings rgyal ba rnams
T02D2488:199a-40: kyi yum mo zhes bya ba la sogs pas bstan
T02D2488:199a-41: to // gzhan yang rdo rje 'dzin pa ni dam tshig dang spyod pas thob pa ma yin te /
T02D2488:199a-42: yang dag pa'i lta ba dang bral bas rig byed gsang tshig gi cho ga bzhin no //
T02D2488:199a-43: de'i phyir na stong pa nyid kyi don rtogs na
T02D2488:199a-44: lus ngag gi spyod pa dang dam tshig la sogs
T02D2488:199a-45: pa theg pa 'og ma'i tshul yin te /
T02D2488:199b-0: rnal 'byor chen po'i rgyud las @199b ni dam tshig dang bya spyod la sogs pa mi dgos te /
T02D2488:199b-1: de ltar rtogs pa ni zab mo'i don khong du
T02D2488:199b-2: chud pa yin no zhes slob dpon gzhan dag zer
T02D2488:199b-3: ro // de yan chod nges don no /
T02D2488:199b-5: // / phyogs gzhan dag la yang dbang bskur pa'i cho ga dang /
T02D2488:199b-7: dam tshig gi sbyor ba la gnas na lta ba gtso bor gyur pa ma yin te /
T02D2488:199b-8: thun mong dang mchog gi dngos grub rten cing 'brel pa'i dngos pos kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2488:199b-9: de dag kyang ci'i phyir zhe na /
T02D2488:199b-10: lung dang rig pa dag ste /
T02D2488:199b-11: rdo rje sa 'og gi rgyud las /
T02D2488:199b-12: dkyil 'khor rdzas kyi sbyor ldan zhing //
T02D2488:199b-13: sbyin sreg las kyi de nyid shes //
T02D2488:199b-14: dam tshig sdom pa'i rgyud ldan na //
T02D2488:199b-15: mtshan mar bltas kyang grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2488:199b-17: gzhan yang sku khros pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2488:199b-18: las kyi sbyor ba rab shes shing //
T02D2488:199b-19: gsang sngags sbyor ba'i tshul bdun ldan /
T02D2488:199b-20: spros bcas spyod pa rab ba mkhas na //
T02D2488:199b-21: spros pa nyid kyis grol bar 'gyur //
T02D2488:199b-23: gzhan yang gcig tu spros pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2488:199b-24: mnyam ldan de nyid bcu shes na //
T02D2488:199b-25: dngos por zhen pas bgegs mi 'gyur //
T02D2488:199b-27: gzhan yang dam tshig rtogs pa'i rgyal po'i rgyud las /
T02D2488:199b-28: sbyor la gnas pa cho ga'i mchog / gsang sngags cho ga sbyor bas 'grub //
T02D2488:199b-30: de nyid bsdus pa chen po'i rgyud las /
T02D2488:199b-31: gsang sngags spyod pas grol 'gyur te //
T02D2488:199b-32: rdo rje 'dzin pa gsang ba'i mchog / ces 'byung ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2488:199b-34: zung du 'brel pa spyod pa'i mchog / spyod pa'i gzhis ni rdo rje 'dzin //
T02D2488:199b-36: phrin las rdzogs pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2488:199b-37: rdo rje padmar rab sbyar nas //
T02D2488:199b-38: bde ba chen po chos kyi sku //
T02D2488:199b-40: slob dpon klu sgrub kyi don de yang de nyid las /
T02D2488:199b-41: rnam par dben don mi shes par //
T02D2488:199b-42: thos pa tsam la 'jug byed cing //
T02D2488:199b-43: gang dag bsod nams mi byed pa //
T02D2488:199b-44: skyes bu tha shal de dag brlag /'bras bur bcas pa'i las rnams dang //
T02D2488:199b-45: 'gro ba dag kyang yang dag brjod //
T02D2488:200a-2: skye ba med par bstan pa yin //
T02D2488:200a-3: zhes bshad pa de yang bdag tu lta ba la
T02D2488:200a-4: sogs pa dgag pa las kun rdzob bsod nams kyi
T02D2488:200a-5: tshogs kyis grub par gsal bar gsungs na /
T02D2488:200a-6: gang dag khyed kyi gzhung la ni //
T02D2488:200a-7: brlag par 'gyur bar gsal bar gsungs te /
T02D2488:200a-8: gzhan yangs sangs rgyas ni chos can sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid 'dus byas yin te /
T02D2488:200a-9: rten cing 'brel bar 'byung ba'i phyir sa bon las
T02D2488:200a-10: myu gu 'byung ba bzhin no zhes lta ba gtso
T02D2488:200a-11: bor mi 'dzin par dam tshig la sogs pa'i spyod
T02D2488:200a-12: pas 'grub po zhes slob dpon kha cig 'dod do
T02D2488:200a-13: // de dag gi gzhung la brjod par bya ste /
T02D2488:200a-14: re zhig phyogs snga ma ltar na don dam pa'i lta ba gtso che ste /
T02D2488:200a-15: dam tshig la sogs pa'i spyod pa khyad du gsod pa'i tshul 'di rigs pa ma yin te /
T02D2488:200a-16: bcom ldan 'das kyis sngags kyi rgyud sde mtha' dag
T02D2488:200a-17: dang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde rnams las lta
T02D2488:200a-18: ba dang spyod pa cha mnyam pa las 'grub par
T02D2488:200a-19: gsungs te / gsang ba mchog gi rgyud las /
T02D2488:200a-20: spros pa'i don ni rab rtogs pa //
T02D2488:200a-21: theg pa mchog la mngon dad cing //
T02D2488:200a-22: snying rjes gzhan gyi don la mos //
T02D2488:200a-23: bdud rtsi lnga ni rab spyod cing //
T02D2488:200a-24: snang srid sgyu ma sbyor shes pas //
T02D2488:200a-25: lha yi sbyor ba de nyid kyis //
T02D2488:200a-26: bsgrub pas dngos grub mchog tu 'gyur //
T02D2488:200a-27: las kyi dngos grub sbyor shes pas //
T02D2488:200a-29: gzhan yang rdo rje padma snyoms par 'jug pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2488:200a-30: gsang ba'i bdag po gsang sngags kyi sbyor bas gnyis
T02D2488:200a-31: su med par sbyor ba'i thabs rten cing 'brel par
T02D2488:200a-32: 'byung ba'i cho gas dngos grub bsgrub par 'gyur te
T02D2488:200a-33: / gsang ba'i bdag po dper na skyes bu'i rtsol ba dang /
T02D2488:200a-37: rtsva rnams 'dus pa las me 'byung ba bzhin du
T02D2488:200a-38: gsang sngags kyi sbyor ba yang stong nyid kyi don
T02D2488:200a-39: dang / rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i che ba dang /
T02D2488:200a-40: dbang dang dam tshig thob pas 'grub par 'gyur gyi /
T02D2488:200a-41: gzhan du na ltung bar 'gyur ro zhes 'byung ba dang /
T02D2488:200a-42: dur khrod gsang ba'i rgyud las 'jam dpal gsang sngags
T02D2488:200b-0: la mngon @200b par dad pa'i rnal 'byor pas dur
T02D2488:200b-1: khrod dam chu 'gram du dogs pa med pa'i sems
T02D2488:200b-2: kyis bskyed pa'i rim pa dang /
T02D2488:200b-3: rdzogs pa'i rim pa'i sbyor bas grub pa dang /
T02D2488:200b-4: sgrub pa chen po la gnas te zla ba drug
T02D2488:200b-5: tu rig pa'i brtul zhugs spyad na rdo rje 'dzin
T02D2488:200b-6: ba'i sa bcu gsum bsgrod par 'gyur ro zhes bshad
T02D2488:200b-7: pa dang / dam tshig bkod pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2488:200b-8: rdo rje 'dzin pa'i tshogs rab tu nyon cig /
T02D2488:200b-9: phyi rabs kyi rnal 'byor pas byang chub kyi sems
T02D2488:200b-11: phyin ci ma log pa'i dam tshig yong su 'dzin pa dang /
T02D2488:200b-12: dogs pa med cing the tshom dang bral ba dang /
T02D2488:200b-13: rang gi lus la chags pa med cing sems can gyi dpon la dga' ba dang /
T02D2488:200b-14: gsang sngags kyi las kyi cho ga shes pa dang /
T02D2488:200b-15: de dag kyang chos dbyings las ma g-yos na sangs
T02D2488:200b-16: rgyas kyi sa yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur ro zhes
T02D2488:200b-17: 'byung ba dang / de'i phyir na sgyu ma mkhan
T02D2488:200b-18: gyis ji ltar rdzas dang sngags kyi khang bzangs la
T02D2488:200b-19: sogs pa bzhin du 'di ltar yang cho ga 'dus
T02D2488:200b-22: dper na sgyu ma mkhan po 'gas //
T02D2488:200b-23: sgyu ma thar par bya phyir brtson //
T02D2488:200b-24: gang phyir de ni mngon shes pas //
T02D2488:200b-25: sgyu ma la ni de mi chags //
T02D2488:200b-26: de bzhin srid gsum sgyu ma ltar //
T02D2488:200b-27: rdzogs pa'i byang chub mkhas pas mkhyen //
T02D2488:200b-29: de'i phyir kun rdzob dang don dam pa la gnas
T02D2488:200b-30: nas de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyang 'gro ba'i don
T02D2488:200b-31: la 'jug ste / rnal 'byor ba rnams kyang tshul de las nyams pas 'grub pa ma yin no //
T02D2488:200b-32: rdo rje thod pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D2488:200b-33: mkha' 'gro ma rnams rab tu nyon cig /'od gsal ba la snyoms par zhugs nas /
T02D2488:200b-34: spros bcas kyi spyod pa yongs su rdzogs na zhing las skyes pa dang /
T02D2488:200b-35: sngags las skyes pa la sogs pas dngos grub thams cad byin cig ces 'byung ba dang /
T02D2488:200b-36: rgyan dam pa'i rgyud las kyang /
T02D2488:200b-37: kun rdzob spros bcas yongs rdzogs shing //
T02D2488:200b-38: spros med mtshan ma med bltas na //
T02D2488:200b-39: tshe gcig dngos grub mchog tu 'byung //
T02D2488:200b-41: gzhan yang dpal gsang ba 'dus pa chen po las /
T02D2488:200b-42: spros bcas spyod pa la gnas shing //
T02D2488:201a-1: med mtshan ma med gnas te //
T02D2488:201a-2: rdo rje glu yis yongs bskul nas //
T02D2488:201a-3: lha mo'i tshogs dang mnyam du rol /
T02D2488:201a-5: thig le gcig pa'i rgyud las /
T02D2488:201a-6: dpa' bos rnal 'byor yongs byas te //
T02D2488:201a-7: bsgrubs kyang dngos grub ma thob ste //
T02D2488:201a-8: mtshan ma med pas lha bsad de //
T02D2488:201a-12: spros bcas la ni brten nas kyang //
T02D2488:201a-13: spros pa med pa rab tu skye //
T02D2488:201a-14: mtshan ma gzugs kyi sku nyid kyang //
T02D2488:201a-18: snying rjes mya ngan 'das mi gnas //
T02D2488:201a-19: shes rab kyis ni 'khor ba min //
T02D2488:201a-20: mtha' gnyis rnam par dor nas kyang //
T02D2488:201a-21: rtog pa med pas 'gro don spyod //
T02D2488:201a-23: gsang ba shin tu mtho ba'i rgyud las /
T02D2488:201a-24: dngos por lta ba rab spangs te //
T02D2488:201a-25: sgyu ma lta bur sbyor shes pas //
T02D2488:201a-26: sngags pas yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
T02D2488:201a-27: sems can don la mnyam med byos //
T02D2488:201a-29: bshad pa'i rgyud rdo rje phreng ba las kyang /
T02D2488:201a-30: gsang sngags lha yi tshul gyis ni //
T02D2488:201a-31: dngos grub thams cad bsgrubs pas 'grub //
T02D2488:201a-32: chos kyi sku la rab gnas te //
T02D2488:201a-33: sprul sku phyogs bcu'i 'gro don byed //
T02D2488:201a-34: de ltar phyi rabs rnal 'byor pas //
T02D2488:201a-37: de ltar na phyogs gnyis ka 'gog par byed pa'i
T02D2488:201a-38: lung bcom ldan 'das nyid kyis rgyud de dag dang
T02D2488:201a-39: / gzhan yang theg pa chen po'i mdo sde dang /
T02D2488:201a-40: bya ba dang spyod pa'i rgyud mtha' dag dang /
T02D2488:201a-41: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud rnams las gzhung 'di nyid shin tu gsal bar bstan pa'i phyir /
T02D2488:201a-42: re zhig phyogs dang po ltar na dam tshig la
T02D2488:201a-43: sogs pa'i spyod pa khyad du bsad de lta ba
T02D2488:201a-44: gtso bor byas nas rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob

T02D2488:205b-33: gzhan yang de'i phyir gsang sngags kyi chos ni thabs
T02D2488:205b-34: gtso bor gyur pa na kun rdzob kyi bden pa

T02D2488:205b-43: gsang sdug bsngal sbyor bas 'grub par 'gyur //
T02D2488:205b-44: 'on kyang de la chags min te //

T02D2488:205b-46: rtag pa ma yin chad pa min //
T02D2488:205b-47: yong med ces brjod yul las 'das //

T02D2488:206a-0: @206a * // lus med kha dog dbyibs med cing //

T02D2488:206a-3: rtsa dang dbugs dang thig le med //
T02D2488:206a-4: sngags dang phyag rgya bya brtsal med //
T02D2488:206a-5: mchog gi bde ba chen po ster //

T02D2488:206a-8: mkhas pas tshul gnyis spang mi bya //
T02D2488:206a-9: shing rta yi ni 'khor lo bzhin //

T02D2488:206a-11: de'i phyir 'di'i don ni slob dpon las dbang thob cing //

T02D2488:206a-13: tshul gyis mchog dang thun mong gi dngos grub bsgrub
T02D2488:206a-14: par bya'o // gal te tshul de lta bu la

T02D2488:207a-15: mtshon ma dag tu lta mi bya //

T02D2488:207a-17: rtsa dang dbugs kyi skor bzlog kyang ;
T02D2488:207a-18: / dngos po yin te zhen mi bya //

T02D2488:207a-44: bdag cag la sogs pa rnal 'byor gyi lam la

T02D2488:207b-0: @207b pas dgongs te bstan pa la mngon par 'chel

T02D2488:207b-27: kha cig dug gi dbang gis 'tsho //

T02D2488:211a-50: rang gi ye shes gang yin pa //

T02D2488:211b-1: zhes 'byung bas sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la

T02D2488:211b-18: chos dbyings bye brag rtogs pas thar //

T02D2488:211b-21: zhes bshad pas khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2488:211b-22: de bas na de rtogs par bya ste bye brag gi rgyud las /
T02D2488:211b-23: byang chub nam mkha'i mtshan nyid de //

T02D2488:211b-33: byang chub sems la 'jug pa dang //
T02D2488:211b-34: gang zhig rtogs par 'dod pa ste //
T02D2488:211b-35: sgrib pa thams cad sel byed cing //
T02D2488:211b-36: bdud rnams shin tu skrag byed de //

T02D2488:211b-39: shin tu rgas pa'i gcan gzan 'jigs //

T02D2488:211b-42: sgra'i don gyi kun rdzob kunda lta bu'i byang chub kyi sems la bya ste /

T02D2488:212a-0: gzhan yang gsang ba'i dbang gi dus su @212a * //
T02D2488:212a-1: goms pas sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'dra ba phab ste sbyin par bya'o //
T02D2488:212a-2: gzhan du spangs na ltung ba'o //
T02D2488:212a-3: gzhan du shes rab ye shes dang /

T02D2488:212a-9: dbang gi rim pa de nyid kyis bskang bar bya'o //

T02D2488:212a-20: dga' ba bzhi'i dkyil 'khor ba mnyes par byas pas ldang ba'o //
T02D2488:212a-21: de'i phyir aindra bh'u tis bshad pa /
T02D2488:212a-22: gang zhig don dam kun rdzob kyi //
T02D2488:212a-23: byang chub sems las nyams gyur na //
T02D2488:212a-24: don dam don dam nyid kyis te //
T02D2488:212a-25: kun rdzob lces blang ga la nyams //
T02D2488:212a-26: de nyid las ni bslab par bya //
T02D2488:212a-27: shukra dor na rtsa ba nyams //
T02D2488:212a-28: chu tshod nas brtsis dga' ba bzhi //
T02D2488:212a-29: goms pas dri ma de las ldang //
T02D2488:212a-30: de phyir dam tshig rig ma dang //
T02D2488:212a-31: rnal 'byor tshang ldan med pas ni //
T02D2488:212a-33: gzhan du ltung ba'i rtsa ba ste //
T02D2488:212a-34: rdo rje 'dzin pa spangs na ltung //
T02D2488:212a-36: de bas na brtan pa thob pas 'bad par bya'o //
T02D2488:212a-38: skye bo 'dod chags can don du //
T02D2488:212a-41: shes rab kyi rgyud las kyang /
T02D2488:212a-42: ji ltar me yis tshig pa las //
T02D2488:212a-43: me de nyid la bsro bar bya //
T02D2488:212a-44: de bzhin rna bar chu song pa //
T02D2488:212a-45: chu de nyid kyis slar dbyung bya //
T02D2488:212a-46: 'dod chags ldan pa'i gang zag kyang //
T02D2488:212a-47: 'dod chags nyid kyis gdul bar bya //
T02D2488:212a-48: zhes bshad pa yang brtan pa dang ldan pa la lam du 'gyur bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:212a-49: de lta ma yin par 'dod chags kyi rjes su
T02D2488:212a-50: 'brangs te sgra tsam gyi phyogs su gzhol ba la
T02D2488:212a-51: ltung ba dang sbom po la sogs par 'gyur bas
T02D2488:212b-0: tshogs pa la bshags la don ma yin par @212b
T02D2488:212b-1: mi 'jug par bsdams la rjes su bskang zhing don
T02D2488:212b-2: du bslab par bya'o zhes bshad pa ste lnga pa
T02D2488:212b-3: yin pas lnga pa ste ltung ba lnga pa'i bshad
T02D2488:212b-5: / da ni ltung ba drug pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
T02D2488:212b-6: rang ngam gzhan gyi grub pa'i mtha' //
T02D2488:212b-7: chos la smod pa drug pa yin //
T02D2488:212b-8: zhes snos te rang ni bdag med par smra ba dang /
T02D2488:212b-10: de la smad par mi bya'o //
T02D2488:212b-11: gzhan dag ni theg pa chen po'i mdo dang rgyud la bya ste /
T02D2488:212b-12: mu stegs sun dbyung ba'o zhes zer te /
T02D2488:212b-13: de yang gzhan de la 'jug pa bzlog pa'i phyir bshad pa ste /
T02D2488:212b-14: nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ste smad pa ma yin te /
T02D2488:212b-16: rnam par snang mdzad ring ba'i rgyu //
T02D2488:212b-17: mu stegs can la smad mi bya //
T02D2488:212b-20: grub pa'i mtha' yis blo bskyed phyir //
T02D2488:212b-21: phyi rol ba yang lam tshol zhugs //
T02D2488:212b-22: de phyir de la smad mi bya //
T02D2488:212b-23: lam zhugs nyan thos smos ci dgos //
T02D2488:212b-26: sems can bsam pa tha dad pas //
T02D2488:212b-27: mya ngan 'das par drang ba'i phyir //
T02D2488:212b-28: byin gyis brlabs dang mngon sum pas //
T02D2488:212b-29: 'di dang phyi rol bstan pa yin //
T02D2488:212b-30: de phyir smad par mi bya ste /
T02D2488:212b-31: phal cher thar lam 'dod pas so //
T02D2488:212b-33: de'i phyir lha sbyin yang yang dag pas na lha sbyin ma yin la /
T02D2488:212b-34: mu stegs can gyi grub pa'i mtha' la yang smad par mi bya'o zhes 'byung ba ste /
T02D2488:212b-35: theg pa chen po la gzud pa dang /
T02D2488:212b-36: lta ba ngan pa la dad pa sun dbyung ba dang /
T02D2488:212b-37: gdul bya'i bsam pas smad pa la nyes pa med do //
T02D2488:212b-38: bsod nams kyang mang du 'phel lo //
T02D2488:212b-39: de'i phyir rgyud la smad na ltung ba'o //
T02D2488:212b-40: theg pa chen po'i mdo sde la smad na sbom po'o //
T02D2488:212b-41: nyan thos kyi la nyes byas so //
T02D2488:212b-42: phyi rol pa yang phra mo'i nyes byas so //
T02D2488:212b-43: sbyor ba du dang ldan pas dngos gzhir 'gyur bas ltung ba dang /

T02D2488:212b-46: ba la sogs pa'i nyes byas dang nyes pa med
T02D2488:212b-48: de bas na lam tshol ba la zhugs pa dang /
T02D2488:213a-2: lam ches che ba'i lam bla na med pa la
T02D2488:213a-3: zhugs pa'i snod kyi rim pas lam la ma zhugs
T02D2488:213a-5: phyi rol pa la bdag med par bstan pa dang /
T02D2488:213a-6: nyan thos la sogs pa la khyad par gyi lam bstan pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2488:213a-7: lam med grub pa'i mtha' la dgod //
T02D2488:213a-8: phyi rol pa la bdag med bstan //

T02D2488:213a-10: rnam pa sna tshogs thabs kyis gdul //
T02D2488:213a-12: dgyes pa'i rdo rje las kyang /

T02D2488:213a-18: theg pa sna tshogs thabs tshul rig /'gro ba'i don la rtogs pa po //
T02D2488:213a-19: theg pa gsum gyi nges 'byung la //
T02D2488:213a-20: theg pa gcig gi 'bras bur gnas //
T02D2488:213a-21: nyon mongs khams rnams dag pa'i bdag / las kyi khams rnams zad byed pa //
T02D2488:213a-23: thabs sna tshogs kyis gdul bya gdul bar bya'o //

T02D2488:213a-25: zhugs pa ni 'og ma spong bcug la gong ma la dgod pa'o //
T02D2488:213a-27: dmyal bar 'gro ba byang chub la //
T02D2488:213a-28: rtag tu gegs byed ma yin te //
T02D2488:213a-29: rang sangs rgyas kyi sa rnams dang //
T02D2488:213a-30: nyan thos sa yis gegs byed do //
T02D2488:213a-32: de bzhin du 'jig rten pa'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2488:213a-33: bden par smra bya khro mi bya //
T02D2488:213a-34: slong na chung yang sbyin par bya //
T02D2488:213a-35: snyan par smra bya khro mi bya //
T02D2488:213a-36: rnam pa 'di gsum gnas kyis ni //
T02D2488:213a-37: lha yi nang du skye bar 'gyur //
T02D2488:213a-39: 'jig rten pa yis yang dag lta //
T02D2488:213a-40: chen po su la yod gyur pa //
T02D2488:213a-41: de ni tshe rabs stong du yang //
T02D2488:213a-44: de bas na dgongs pas rig par bya'o //
T02D2488:213a-45: de'i phyir bskang ba yang phal cher yul dang bsam
T02D2488:213a-46: pa dang dus la sogs pa shes par bya ste
T02D2488:213a-48: dgongs pa sna tshogs pa'i don dang /
T02D2488:213a-49: yang dag pa'i don shes pa la gzhug cing phyis bsdams te /
T02D2488:213b-0: tshogs pa'i nang du bshags @213b pas dri ma las ldang ngo //
T02D2488:213b-1: gzhan du na phyis sngom pa dang dam pa gcig
T02D2488:213b-2: la bshags pas ldang ste de'i phyir blos phye bas
T02D2488:213b-3: shes par bya ste ltung pa drug pa'i bshad pa'o
T02D2488:213b-5: / // / da ni ltung ba bdun pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod pas /
T02D2488:213b-6: yongs su ma smin sems can la //
T02D2488:213b-7: gsang ba sgrogs pa bdun pa yin //

T02D2488:213b-10: tshogs smin par ma byas pa dang /
T02D2488:213b-11: cho ga rdzogs pas smin par ma byas pa dang /
T02D2488:213b-12: zab pas 'jigs pas ma smin pa dang /
T02D2488:213b-14: de la rang bzhin gyi log sred can snod kha
T02D2488:213b-15: spub pa thabs sna tshogs kyis btul yang snod du
T02D2488:213b-17: skur zhing smod par byas pas bstan par bya ba ma yin pa'o //
T02D2488:213b-18: gzhan du na snod du ma gyur pa med de /
T02D2488:213b-20: rigs ngan sme sha can la sogs //
T02D2488:213b-21: gsod pa don du gnyer ba rnams //
T02D2488:213b-25: mtshams med lnga po byed pa dang //
T02D2488:213b-26: gsod la sogs pa'i mi dge sogs //
T02D2488:213b-27: dbang ma bskur ba'i mi rnams kyang //
T02D2488:213b-28: nag pos bka' stsal bzhin du 'grub //
T02D2488:213b-30: sbyor ba phul du gyur pa'i tshig go //
T02D2488:213b-31: byang chub kyi sems dang ldan pa la snod du rung bar bshad kyi /
T02D2488:213b-32: thams cad du cho ga med pas ni 'grub pa ma yin no //
T02D2488:213b-33: slob dpon dang slob ma rkyen ma tshang pas snod
T02D2488:213b-34: du rung yang dbang ma thob pa'i gang zag kyang
T02D2488:213b-35: ngo // bum pa'i dbang tsam thob pa la gsang ba la sogs pa ma thob pa yang ngo //
T02D2488:213b-36: dbang rdzogs kyang spyod pa dang rig pa'i brtul zhugs dang /
T02D2488:213b-37: lam rnam pa bzhi'i tshul dang zab mo'i don la 'jigs pa yang snod du ma gyur pa'o //
T02D2488:213b-38: thob kyang ltung ba la sogs pa 'byung ste /
T02D2488:213b-39: nyams kyang rkyen ma tshang ba dang /
T02D2488:213b-40: ma gus pas dri ma las mi ldang ba yang ma smin par shes par bya'o //

T02D2488:213b-42: rje slob dpon gyi 'dod pa dang 'jig rten gyi
T02D2488:213b-43: chos brgyad kyis bsam pas mi 'dul zhing ma gus
T02D2488:213b-44: pa la skur bas ltung bar 'gyur la /
T02D2488:213b-45: smin par byas kyang dri ma ma dag pa la ston pa ni ltung ba ste /
T02D2488:213b-46: snying rje zhugs na sbom po'o //
T02D2488:214a-1: yin par bstan te lus ngag gis bsdam pa ma byas na nyes byas so //
T02D2488:214a-2: 'og ma'i cho ga byas ba la gong ma ston na lci ba'o //
T02D2488:214a-3: ma rtogs pa phra mo'i nyes byas so //
T02D2488:214a-4: zhing dang bsam pas lci yang dang sbyor ba dus dngos gzhir gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //

T02D2488:214a-6: tshogs kyi 'khor lo'i nang du 'dus pa dang /
T02D2488:214a-7: nyes byas bshags pa'i dus su 'dus pa dang /
T02D2488:214a-8: spa bar bya ba brda dang phyag rgya gcig tsam
T02D2488:214a-9: mthong bas bshags pa'i tshad kyang dus yol ba dang
T02D2488:214a-10: ma yol bas de nyid dbang rnam pa gsum nyid
T02D2488:214a-13: tshogs kyi mchod pas 'dus pa la bshags pa dang /
T02D2488:214a-15: mandala sngon du 'gro bas dri ma las ldang bar bya'o //
T02D2488:214a-16: 'di ni slob dpon gyi nyes pa'o //

T02D2488:214a-19: smin dang ma smin rim pa rnams //
T02D2488:214a-20: gung mo'i rtse mo brnga sbyor sogs //
T02D2488:214a-21: mkhas pas rtogs par mi byed na //
T02D2488:214a-22: gal te 'dod pa'i bsam pas zhugs //
T02D2488:214a-23: de ni shin tu lci ba ste //
T02D2488:214a-24: snying rje can la shin tu yang //
T02D2488:214a-25: snyom las la sogs nyes pa chung //
T02D2488:214a-26: rkun thabs slob ma'i nyes pa'o //
T02D2488:214a-27: dbang bskur tshogs 'khor la sogs dang //
T02D2488:214a-28: mandala ngag gi bshags pas bsdam //
T02D2488:214a-29: gzhan du skyes bu tha shal brlag / ces bshad pas rgya cher shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:214a-30: shan 'dra ba phyogs su bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2488:214a-31: phal cher yul dang dngos po dang /
T02D2488:214a-35: gzhan gyi don la sogs spyad de dri ma las ldang bar bya'o //
T02D2488:214a-36: slob dpon gyi nyes pa ni ltung ba dang po dang sbyar te bshags par bya'o //
T02D2488:214a-38: yongs su smin par ma byas shing //
T02D2488:214a-39: bla ma la sogs mchod mi byed //
T02D2488:214a-40: zab mo'i don la zhugs gyur kyang //
T02D2488:214a-41: nyan la sogs te phyag rgya 'ching //
T02D2488:214a-42: ji ltar sa bon tshig pa las //
T02D2488:214a-44: zhes bya bas gsal bar bstan te /
T02D2488:214a-45: de'i phyir slob dpon dang slob ma yongs su smin
T02D2488:214b-0: na 'bras bu chen por 'gyur @214b ro zhes bstan
T02D2488:214b-1: pa'o // de bas na 'dod pa la sogs pas
T02D2488:214b-2: zab mo'i don bstan na ltung ba'o zhes bshad pa
T02D2488:214b-3: ste ltung ba bdun pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2488:214b-5: // / da ni ltung ba brgyad pa'i mtshan nyid brjod par bya ste /
T02D2488:214b-6: phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid //
T02D2488:214b-7: de la smod byed brgyad pa yin//
T02D2488:214b-9: phung po ni gzugs la sogs pa lnga'o //
T02D2488:214b-10: sangs rgyas ni de dag gi rang bzhin dang /
T02D2488:214b-12: rang bzhin gyis ni gzod ma nas ma skyes pa'o //
T02D2488:214b-13: gzod ma nas rang bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba ni
T02D2488:214b-14: shes pa dang shes bya tha dad du med pa'i
T02D2488:214b-15: phyir 'di ni sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la
T02D2488:214b-16: rang bzhin gyis rnam par mi rtog pa'i ye shes
T02D2488:214b-18: glo bur gyi dri ma mthong bas spang bar bya ba dang /
T02D2488:214b-19: bsgom pas spang bar bya bas ma thob pa thob par bya ba ni ma yin te /
T02D2488:214b-20: gzhan du na thog ma med pa'i dus nas ma
T02D2488:214b-21: rig pa'i bag chags kyis yongs su dkrugs pa'i phyir
T02D2488:214b-22: shin tu bag chags kyi mthu brtas pas ma rig
T02D2488:214b-23: pa'i thibs po sa non pa'i phyir tshe gcig la
T02D2488:214b-24: sogs te / bskal pa grangs med pa gsum gyis rnam pa thams cad mkhyen par ga la 'gyur /
T02D2488:214b-25: de'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi rgyud la rang
T02D2488:214b-26: bzhin gyis 'od gsal ba'i rnam par mi rtog pa'i
T02D2488:214b-28: de'i nus pa'i khyad par dang /
T02D2488:214b-29: yon tan gyi khyad par las gnyis su med pa'i khyad par dang /
T02D2488:214b-30: yul dang yul can du snang ba ste /
T02D2488:214b-31: de'i phyir dpal gsang ba 'dus pa la sogs pa
T02D2488:214b-32: rnal 'byor dang rnal 'byor ma'i rgyud mtha' dag las
T02D2488:214b-33: / lus kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa snang ba ste don de nyid la dgongs pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2488:214b-35: phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid //
T02D2488:214b-36: spyan la sogs pa chen po bzhi //
T02D2488:214b-37: sgrol ma la sogs de bzhin no //
T02D2488:214b-38: yul dang yul can rang snang ba'i//
T02D2488:214b-39: khams dang skye mched mang po ni //
T02D2488:214b-40: sa snying la sogs byang chub sems //
T02D2488:214b-41: gzugs kyi phung po bgegs mthar byed //
T02D2488:214b-42: lus kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang //
T02D2488:214b-45: gzugs ni rnam par snang mdzad de //
T02D2488:214b-46: tshor ba rin chen 'byung ldan yin //
T02D2488:215a-0: @215a * // 'du shes snang ba mtha' yas so //
T02D2488:215a-1: 'du byed don yod grub pa yin //
T02D2488:215a-2: rnam par shes pa mi bskyod pa //
T02D2488:215a-3: zhes bya ba la sogs pa thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud mang po las gsal bar bstan te /
T02D2488:215a-4: bdag dang gzhan rdo rje theg pa'i rnal 'byor pa
T02D2488:215a-5: rnams la 'di ni bsgrub pa'i phyir rgyud de dag
T02D2488:215a-6: gi dgongs pa bdag gis 'dir ma spros so //
T02D2488:215a-7: rgyud de dag las kyang lha'i grangs tha dad par snang ste /
T02D2488:215a-8: de dag kyang gdul ba'i bsam pa dang /
T02D2488:215a-9: rten cing 'brel par 'byung ba'i nus pa dang /
T02D2488:215a-10: dbang po'i bye brag gis gsungs kyi /
T02D2488:215a-11: rnam par dag pa lus kyi dkyil 'khor bkod pa
T02D2488:215a-12: phung po las tha dad par brjod pa ni ma
T02D2488:215a-14: de yi rang bzhin de yin phyir //
T02D2488:215a-15: de yi nus pa de la gnas //
T02D2488:215a-16: de phyir sems can sangs rgyas te //
T02D2488:215a-17: thams kyis 'khrul pa bzlog pa'i phyir //
T02D2488:215a-18: de phyir sangs rgyas tha dad snang //
T02D2488:215a-19: lus la dkyil 'khor rnam bar dgod //
T02D2488:215a-21: byin gyis brlabs pa'i tshul gyis kyang rnam par rtog pa'i bag chags zad par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2488:215a-22: bsod nams kyi tshogs yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i phyir dang /
T02D2488:215a-23: las dang po pa'i gang zag rnal 'byor pa'i sems
T02D2488:215a-24: goms par bya ba'i phyir dbang dang dam tshig sngon
T02D2488:215a-25: du 'gro bas yan lag bdun pas sems rgyud sbyangs
T02D2488:215a-26: te / stong pa nyid las lha'i gzugs su rnam par ldang zhing /
T02D2488:215a-28: gnyis su med pas phra mo dang thig le dang
T02D2488:215a-29: rtsa'i 'khor lo rnam par bsgoms te cho ga thams
T02D2488:215a-31: rang bzhin du gnas pa'i don dang byin gyis brlabs
T02D2488:215a-32: pa'i lus kyi dkyil 'khor la thun bzhi'i rim pas
T02D2488:215a-33: tshogs kyi mchod pas bsnyen par byed cing /
T02D2488:215a-34: bdag dang tha mi dad par mnyam pa ni /
T02D2488:215a-35: phung po sangs rgyas mnga' bdag nyid do //
T02D2488:215a-37: rnal 'byor gyi lam gyi rim pa la 'jug pa las /
T02D2488:215a-38: brtags pas lha yi dkyil 'khor bsgom //
T02D2488:215a-39: thun bzhi'i rim pas tshogs kyis mchod //
T02D2488:215a-40: dka' thub la sogs rnam spangs te //
T02D2488:215a-41: skad cig sangs rgyas bral med 'grub //
T02D2488:215b-0: de bas na de la brnyas pa ni ltung @215b ba ste /
T02D2488:215b-4: tha snyad du sems pa dang /
T02D2488:215b-9: lus dran pa nye bar gzhag pas mi gtsang ba'i
T02D2488:215b-10: rdzas sum cu rtsa gnyis su sun 'byin par byed
T02D2488:215b-11: pa la / yan lag la sogs pa ma rung bar byed cing gso nyid dang /
T02D2488:215b-13: snying po med pa nyid dang zhes rnam par brnyas shing smod par byed de de ni ltung ba'o //
T02D2488:215b-14: de yang yan lag dus dngos gzhir gyur pa dang /
T02D2488:215b-15: ltung ba dang yan lag gi nyes pa yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:215b-19: rang bzhin dang byin gyis brlabs pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgom
T02D2488:215b-20: zhing phyis skad cig kyang mi 'jug pa la bslab
T02D2488:215b-21: par bya'o // ltung ba brgyad ba'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2488:215b-23: // / da ni ltung ba dgu pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod na /
T02D2488:215b-24: rang bzhin dag pa'i chos rnams la //
T02D2488:215b-25: som nyi za ba dgu pa yin //
T02D2488:215b-27: rang bzhin gyis dag pa ni bdag med pas rnam par dben pa'o //
T02D2488:215b-28: de'i phyir de ni rang bzhin gyis rnam par dben pa'o //
T02D2488:215b-29: gzhan phya dang dbang phyug dang byed pa po dang bdag tu 'dod pa ste /
T02D2488:215b-30: de dag dang gzhan yang phyi rol gyi dngos po
T02D2488:215b-31: don du 'dod cing bsags pa dang 'dus pa'i dngos
T02D2488:215b-32: po dang / shes pa yang dus gsum rdzas su smra ba dang /
T02D2488:215b-33: gzhan yang nang gi shes byed ni don du yod la /
T02D2488:215b-34: shes bya gnyis med pa la don lta bur snang
T02D2488:215b-35: pa'o zhes 'dod pa la sogs pa'i grub pa'i mtha'
T02D2488:215b-37: ci rang bzhin rnam par dag pa'i chos su smra
T02D2488:215b-38: ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i bka' 'am bdud kyi
T02D2488:215b-40: yang dag pa'i don la the tshom za zhing phyi
T02D2488:215b-41: rol pa la sogs pa grub pa'i mtha' sna tshogs
T02D2488:215b-42: su rtog cing the tshom za ba'o //
T02D2488:215b-43: gzhan dag rjod byed kyi chos rgyud dang shes rab
T02D2488:215b-44: kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i mdo rnams la smod
T02D2488:215b-45: pa'o // de yang tha dad par brjod pa ma yin te /
T02D2488:215b-47: de'i phyir de la the tshom za ba ni ltung ba'o //
T02D2488:215b-48: sbyor ba du dang ldan pas dngos gzhir 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:216a-0: @216a * // ltung ba dang yan lag gi nyes pa yang zhing
T02D2488:216a-1: dang bsam pa dang dus dang sbyor ba'i bye brag
T02D2488:216a-3: dri ma lags ldang ba ni tshogs pa la bshags
T02D2488:216a-4: la phyis bsdams te skye ba med pa la 'jug
T02D2488:216a-5: par bya'o // gzhan gdul ba'i bsam pa dang /
T02D2488:216a-6: dngos po gtan la 'bebs pa dang /
T02D2488:216a-7: bcom ldan 'das kyi dgongs pa 'grel ba'i dus su nyes pa med do //
T02D2488:216a-8: gzhi mthun pa'i phyogs su bsdu'o //
T02D2488:216a-9: ltung ba dgu pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2488:216a-11: // / da ni ltung ba bcu pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas //
T02D2488:216a-12: gdug la rtag tu byams sems ldan //
T02D2488:216a-13: byed pa de ni bcu par 'dod //
T02D2488:216a-15: de yang gdug pa ni bdud dang mu stegs dang /
T02D2488:216a-16: phyir rgol ba dregs pa can dang /
T02D2488:216a-17: log sred can la sogs pa ste /
T02D2488:216a-18: yang dag pa'i bkas mi 'dul ba dang /
T02D2488:216a-19: byang chub kyi sems dang snying rje dang bral ba'i
T02D2488:216a-20: gang zag la snying rjes rdzu 'phrul gyis 'dul ba
T02D2488:216a-21: dang / thabs gzhan gyis mi 'dul ba la snying
T02D2488:216a-22: rjes bsgral ba la sogs pas 'di dang phyi ma'i
T02D2488:216a-23: don chen po thob par mi byed pa dang /
T02D2488:216a-24: bla ma dang dkon mchog dang sems can phal po
T02D2488:216a-25: che la gnod pa'i gang zag la dga' bar byed
T02D2488:216a-26: pa'o // de la snying rjes bsdu pa'i dngos po bzhi dang /
T02D2488:216a-27: thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa sna tshogs kyis 'dul ba dang /
T02D2488:216a-28: rdzu 'phrul dang drag shul gyi spyod pas mi 'dul na ltung ba'o //
T02D2488:216a-29: de'i phyir bde mchog 'khor lo las /
T02D2488:216a-30: shin tu khro zhing gtum pa la //
T02D2488:216a-31: zhi bas phan par mi 'gyur te//
T02D2488:216a-32: shes rab thabs kyi sbyor ba yis //
T02D2488:216a-33: khro bor de bzhin gshegs kun mdzad //
T02D2488:216a-36: snying rje chen po'i stobs kyis ni //
T02D2488:216a-37: gdug pa yal bar mi 'dor te //
T02D2488:216a-38: rdzu 'phrul bsgral la sogs pas gdul //
T02D2488:216a-39: gzhan du bla ma dkon mchog spangs//
T02D2488:216a-41: sbyor ba du dang ldan pas dngos gzhir 'gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:216a-42: dri ma las ldang ba dang /
T02D2488:216a-44: phrin las rnam pa bzhin de bzhin gshegs pa'i phrin las mdzad pa'o //
T02D2488:216a-45: shan 'dra pa ni phyogs su bsdu pa'o//
T02D2488:216b-0: @216b ltung ba bcu pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D2488:216b-2: // / da ni ltung ba bcu gcig pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
T02D2488:216b-3: ming sogs bral ba'i chos rnams la //
T02D2488:216b-4: der rtog pa ni bcu gcig pa //
T02D2488:216b-6: ming sogs bral ba'i chos rnams ni //
T02D2488:216b-7: rjod par byed pa'i tha snyad las 'das pa ste /
T02D2488:216b-8: mi rtog pa'i ye shes kyi yul shes brjod kyi yul bas 'das pa'o //
T02D2488:216b-9: de yang lung dang rigs pas grub ste /
T02D2488:216b-10: lung ni theg pa chen po'i rgyud dang mdo mtha' dag las grub pa'o //
T02D2488:216b-12: dngos rnams bdag dang gzhan las min //
T02D2488:216b-13: gnyis ka las te med mi skye //
T02D2488:216b-14: skye 'gag spros bral rnam par stong //
T02D2488:216b-15: yod med shes brjod yul las 'das //
T02D2488:216b-16: gcig dang du ma'i mtha' shes shing //
T02D2488:216b-17: skad cig cha shas brtags pas dben //
T02D2488:216b-18: gzugs dang stong ba tha dad min //
T02D2488:216b-19: kun nas nyon mongs rnam par byang //
T02D2488:216b-20: 'dod chags nyon mongs bdag lta dang //
T02D2488:216b-21: skye med thams cad mkhyen pa yang //
T02D2488:216b-22: rang bzhin gcig ste tha dad med //
T02D2488:216b-25: gzhan yang shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa
T02D2488:216b-26: las chos thams cad rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma
T02D2488:216b-27: lta bu'o // mya ngan las 'das pa'i chos thams
T02D2488:216b-28: cad kyang rmi lam lta bu sgyu ma lta bu
T02D2488:216b-29: lta bu'o // / mya ngan las 'das pa las
T02D2488:216b-30: ches lhag pa'i chos cig yod na yang rmi lam
T02D2488:216b-31: lta bu sgyu ma lta bu'o //
T02D2488:216b-33: phyi dang nang gi dngos po ni //
T02D2488:216b-34: dam pa'i don du rang bzhin med //
T02D2488:216b-35: bdag las ma skyes gzhan las min//
T02D2488:216b-36: gnyis ka las te rgyu med min //
T02D2488:216b-37: gzugs brnyan la sogs bzhin du brtag / bdag la sogs pas rnam par dben //
T02D2488:216b-38: nang gi shes pa yod min te //
T02D2488:216b-39: rtag chad mtha' dang rnam par bral //
T02D2488:216b-40: gzhan du lung dang rigs pas gnod //
T02D2488:216b-42: slob dpon 'phags pa lhas bshad pa //
T02D2488:216b-43: ji srid yod par rtog pa na //
T02D2488:216b-44: de yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02D2488:216b-45: ji srid med par rtog pa na //
T02D2488:216b-46: de yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02D2488:216b-47: ji srid dbus mar rtog pa na //
T02D2488:216b-48: de yang sgyu ma'i mtshan nyid min //
T02D2488:216b-49: de kun rang bzhin med do zhes //
T02D2488:217a-2: bdag byin brlab las phyi rol phyogs //
T02D2488:217a-3: zhes bshad pas ming dang brda la sogs pa dang
T02D2488:217a-4: bral ba'i chos lung dang rigs pas yang dag par
T02D2488:217a-5: bsgrub ste / rigs pa ni rgya cher slob dpon klu sgrub kyi zhal snga nas /
T02D2488:217a-6: dbu ma rigs pa'i tshogs las rgya cher gtan la phab pas /
T02D2488:217a-7: de yang 'dir bdag gis spros na don med pa'i phyir ma spros so //
T02D2488:217a-8: de'i rtag pa dang chad pa'i mthar rtog na ni ltung ba'o //
T02D2488:217a-9: yan lag dus dngos gzhir 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:217a-10: ldang ba ni tshogs pa la bshags te de nyid las log ste goms par byed pa'o //
T02D2488:217a-11: ltung ba bcu gcig pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2488:217a-13: // / da ni ltung ba bcu gnyis pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
T02D2488:217a-14: sems can dad dang ldan pa yi //
T02D2488:217a-15: sems sun 'byin pa bcu gnyis pa //
T02D2488:217a-17: theg pa la gsar du zhugs pa'i las dang po
T02D2488:217a-18: pa la sogs pa la mi dad cing ma gus
T02D2488:217a-19: pa'i rnal 'byor pa lus ngag gis bag med par
T02D2488:217a-20: spyod cing / de'i rgyus gzhan ma dang cing rdo
T02D2488:217a-21: rje theg pa la smod cing ma zhugs pa rnams
T02D2488:217a-22: spyod cing / mi 'jug cing / zhugs pa rnams zlog par byed na ltung bar 'gyur te /
T02D2488:217a-23: yan lag dus dngos gzhir 'gyur ba yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:217a-24: yan lag gi nyes byas la sogs pa lci yang
T02D2488:217a-25: gi bye brag gis dri ma las ldang ba yang
T02D2488:217a-26: tshogs pa la bshags pa dang /
T02D2488:217a-27: mandala sngon du 'gro bas dam pa gcig la bshags pa dang /
T02D2488:217a-28: phra mo ni sems kyis bsdams te de nyid la sogs pa rjes su gzung ba'o //
T02D2488:217a-29: yul dang dus dang bsam pa dang /
T02D2488:217a-30: rkyen gyi bye brag gis nyes pa lci yang dang nyes med pa yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:217a-31: ltung ba bcu gnyis pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2488:217a-33: // / da ni ltung ba bcu gsum pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par 'dod nas /
T02D2488:217a-34: dam tshig rdzas ni ji bzhin rnyed //
T02D2488:217a-35: mi bsten pa ni bcu gsum pa //
T02D2488:217a-37: dam tshig ni 'dir bshad pa dang 'chad par 'gyur ba la bya ste /
T02D2488:217a-38: de khyad du gsod cing ma gus pa dang /
T02D2488:217a-39: nyon mongs pas zil gyis non pas nyes pa byung
T02D2488:217b-0: yang dri ma @217b las ldang bar mi byed pa
T02D2488:217b-1: dang / mi shes pa yang ltung ba 'byung ba'i rgyu ste /
T02D2488:217b-2: de bas na skyes bu blun po smin par byas
T02D2488:217b-3: pa rnams kyang phal cher ltung ba'i gzhi yin pas
T02D2488:217b-4: / de dag ni dri ma las ldang ba dka' ba ste /
T02D2488:217b-5: de dag rang gi ldang ba'i nus pa chung ba'i phyir phal cher gzhan la bsten pa dang /
T02D2488:217b-6: dpa' bo'i ston mo la sogs pas ldang bar shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:217b-7: skyes bu shes rab can rnams kyis dri ma las
T02D2488:217b-8: ldang ba ni shin tu yang bas de dag kyang
T02D2488:217b-9: sgyu ma lta bu'i don la mkhas pa dag gis
T02D2488:217b-12: mkhas pas dri ma las ldang ba ;
T02D2488:217b-13: / bshags dang bral dang bkru ba dang //
T02D2488:217b-14: dbyung dang bsreg dang dmigs pas stong //
T02D2488:217b-15: dbang dang tshogs la sogs pa dang //
T02D2488:217b-16: tshogs pa 'dus dang dam pa gcig / dkyil 'khor la sogs mdun du byas //
T02D2488:217b-17: dkyil 'khor sbyin sreg mchod rten dang //
T02D2488:217b-18: gtor ma la sogs dri ma ldang //
T02D2488:217b-19: blun pos lci pa dri ma la //
T02D2488:217b-20: 'dag pa'i shes pa min par rtog / ces bya ba la sogs pas bshad pa dang /
T02D2488:217b-21: gzhan yang de lta bu'i dbang du byas nas /
T02D2488:217b-22: mkhas pas sdig pa bshags pa dang ldang ba yang /
T02D2488:217b-23: mkhas pas sdig pa byas pa rnam smin 'phral la spyang //
T02D2488:217b-24: mi mkhas sdig pa byas pas de nyid thur du 'gro //
T02D2488:217b-25: lcags kyi gong bu chung yang chu yi gting du 'gro //
T02D2488:217b-26: de nyid snod du byas na che yang kha na 'phyo //
T02D2488:217b-27: zhes bshad pas kyang tshul de nyid bstan to //
T02D2488:217b-29: mkhas pas sdig pa byas pa rnams //
T02D2488:217b-30: bka' sogs bslus te shin tu lci //
T02D2488:217b-31: blun pos sdig pa lci ba min //
T02D2488:217b-32: rang bzhin blun pa nyid kyis so //
T02D2488:217b-33: zhes bya ba yang mkhas pas bka' bslus pa dang /
T02D2488:217b-34: khyad du dpas lci par shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:217b-35: de'i phyir don du mi gnyer ba ni ltung ba'o //
T02D2488:217b-36: gzhan yang sku gsung thugs kyi dam tshig thun bzhi'i
T02D2488:217b-37: rim pas sku'i dam tshig ni lha'i rnam par bsgom
T02D2488:217b-38: pa dang / gsung gi dam tshig ni sngags kyi grangs dang /
T02D2488:217b-39: thugs kyi dam tshig ni bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis mi rtog pa dang /
T02D2488:218a-2: gzhan yang 'dod chags la sogs pa nyon mongs pa
T02D2488:218a-3: lnga'i rang bzhin shes par byas te mi spad pa
T02D2488:218a-4: dang / rnam par snang mdzad dang /
T02D2488:218a-5: dri chu la sogs pa bdud rtsi rnam pa lnga'i rang bzhin shes par byas te /
T02D2488:218a-6: sbar sbur la sogs pa sbyangs nas mi bsten par 'dor ba dang /
T02D2488:218a-7: gzhan yang byang chub kyi sems kyi rtsa sum cu rtsa gnyis nas /
T02D2488:218a-8: chu ser la sogs pa'i byang chub kyi sems rnams bsten par mi byed cing 'dor ba dang /
T02D2488:218a-9: gzhan yang yan lag gi dam tshig mang du bshad pa rnams bsten par mi byed pa dang /
T02D2488:218a-10: rtog pa dang bral zhing mnyam pa nyid kyi don rtogs te /
T02D2488:218a-11: blang ba dang dor ba med pa'i dam tshig la mi gnas pa'o //
T02D2488:218a-12: de dag las 'da' bar byed pa ni ltung ba'o //
T02D2488:218a-13: yan lag dus dngos gzhir gyur pa yang shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:218a-14: ldang ba ni bshad zin pa dang /
T02D2488:218a-15: 'chad par 'gyur ba rnams kyi dam tshig nyams par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2488:218a-16: ldang ba yang de nyid las shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:218a-17: yul dang bsam pa dang dus dang rkyen gyi bye
T02D2488:218a-18: brag gis nyes pa dang nyes pa med pa yang
T02D2488:218a-19: shes par bya'o // ltung ba bcu gsum pa'i bshad pa'o /
T02D2488:218a-22: // / da ni ltung ba bcu bzhi pa'i mtshan nyid bshad par bya ste /
T02D2488:218a-23: shes rab rang bzhin bud med la //
T02D2488:218a-24: smod par byed pa bcu bzhi pa //
T02D2488:218a-26: shes rab kyi rang bzhin ni sangs rgyas kyi yum shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin ma ste /
T02D2488:218a-27: de yang gsang ba dang shes rab ye shes kyi dbang gi dus su gzung ba dang /

T02D2488:226b-21: bskyed pa'i rim la legs gnas te ;

T02D2488:227a-0: @227a * // rang rig shes brjod yul las 'das //
T02D2488:227a-1: sgra dang brda dang dbang po yis //

T02D2488:227a-5: rjes su shes pa sgyu ma bzhin //
T02D2488:227a-6: rab mtha'i shes pa rtog goms pas //
T02D2488:227a-7: rtog med gzhan don nor bu bzhin //
T02D2488:227a-8: sku gsum ye shes lnga la sogs //
T02D2488:227a-9: thub pa'i yon tan dpag bsam shing //

T02D2488:227a-12: bzhi pa'i dbang gis rab tu brgyan //

T02D2488:227a-14: rdo rje sems dpa' mthar phyin lam /

T02D2488:227a-16: mnyam par bzhag pa'i spyod pa chen po'o //

T02D2488:227a-23: dkyil 'khor sngon du 'gro bas dam pa gcig la bshags pa'o //
T02D2488:227a-24: phyis bsdam par bya ba la bslab par bya'o //

T02D2488:227b-28: zhes bya ba la sogs pa de nyid rgyas par shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:227b-29: de bas na snod min bsten pa ni yan lag gi nyes pa'o //
T02D2488:227b-30: rin chen can ni smin par byas pa'o //
T02D2488:227b-31: 'dod phyir gzhan la gnod pa spang //
T02D2488:227b-33: 'dod pa ni nyon mongs pas kun nas bslang ba ste /
T02D2488:227b-35: sha dang pags pa dang rus pa'i phyir yongs su
T02D2488:227b-36: smin par byas pas de dag spyad na yang yan
T02D2488:227b-38: min na ni ltung ba'i phyogs su bsdu bar bya'o //
T02D2488:227b-39: de ni dri ma las ldang ba yang de nyid kyi phyogs su bsdu'o //
T02D2488:227b-40: dkon mchog la sogs nor la min//
T02D2488:227b-43: grogs khyad par can rdo rje spun la sogs pa'i
T02D2488:227b-44: dkor la ma byin par mthu dang 'jab bus spyad
T02D2488:227b-45: na ltung ba la sogs par 'gyur te /
T02D2488:227b-46: de yang zhing khyad par can gyi nor bdun ri ba phul te /
T02D2488:227b-47: de nas dpa' bo'i ston mo byas la /
T02D2488:227b-48: 'dus pa la bshags te bsdam par bya'o //
T02D2488:227b-49: tha na bdug spos kyang mnam par mi bya'o zhes bshad pas so //
T02D2488:227b-51: tha mal pa dus shes pas so //
T02D2488:227b-52: ser sna can la mthu la sogs pas phrogs te
T02D2488:227b-53: don dang bcas pas spyad par bya'o zhes bshad pas
T02D2488:227b-54: de'i phyir rim pa shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:228a-2: zhes bya ba ni gong du bshad zin to //
T02D2488:228a-3: byang chub med par dge mi 'jug / ces bshad pas ni /
T02D2488:228a-4: smin par byas pas tha na lus ngag gi dge
T02D2488:228a-5: ba phra mo gcig kyang dang po byang chub tu
T02D2488:228a-7: tha mar yongs su bsngo ba'o //
T02D2488:228a-8: bsngo ba yang 'khor gsum yongs su dag ba'o//
T02D2488:228a-9: de'i phyir sgyu ma'i blo can gyis bya bar gsungs te /
T02D2488:228a-11: byang chub sems dpa' blo gros rab tu zhib byang
T02D2488:228a-12: chub kyi ched du spyod pas chos thams cad ngo
T02D2488:228a-13: bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya ste
T02D2488:228a-14: / sbyin pa yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2488:228a-15: len pa yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2488:228a-16: yon gnas kyang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2488:228a-17: bsngo ba yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2488:228a-18: gang yang sngo bar byed pa de yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2488:228a-19: gang du sngo bar byed pa de yang ngo bo nyid med par khong du chud par bya'o //
T02D2488:228a-21: sbyin pa ni sbyin pa'i ngo bo nyid kyis stong ngo //
T02D2488:228a-22: de bzhin du len pa po dang yon gnas dang sbyin pa'i 'bras bu dang /
T02D2488:228a-24: gang byang chub kyi ngo bo nyid kyis stong pa dang sbyar bar bya ste /
T02D2488:228a-25: de ltar na stong pa nyid la mos pa de
T02D2488:228a-26: ni bsam pa tshad med pa'i sgo nas sbyin pa'i
T02D2488:228a-27: pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag par 'gyur
T02D2488:228a-28: te / sbyin pa de ni sbyin pa'i pha rol
T02D2488:228a-29: tu phyin pa zhes bya ba'i ming yang 'thob ste
T02D2488:228a-30: zhes bya ba la sogs pas bshad de /
T02D2488:228a-31: de yang sbyor ba sgyu ma lta bu la gnas la /
T02D2488:228a-32: de'i dngos gzhi mi dmigs pas rnam par stong pa ste sgyu ma las kyang 'das pa'o //
T02D2488:228a-33: rjes la thob pa'i shes pas smon lam rgya chen
T02D2488:228a-34: po tshad gzung du med par bsngo bar bya'o zhes
T02D2488:228a-35: bshad pas / dad pa med pa la dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur /
T02D2488:228a-36: de'i phyir gzhan du nyes par 'gyur ro //
T02D2488:228a-37: rnam shes 'pho ba ni rnal 'byor pa 'chi ba shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'o //
T02D2488:228a-38: 'chi ba'i tshe na bden pa gnyis kyi tshul gyis
T02D2488:228a-39: sgyu ma'i blo dang ldan pas chags sdang la sogs
T02D2488:228a-40: pa med pas dkyil 'khor gsal bar byas la dri
T02D2488:228a-41: ma las ldang ba sngon du 'gro bas /
T02D2488:228a-42: srog 'phrog pa'i rim pas dkyil 'khor gyi 'khor lo bsdus te /
T02D2488:228a-43: rang gi ye shes dang mi gnyis par byas te /
T02D2488:228a-44: 'od zer gyis khams gsum dag par byas la dkyil 'khor la bltas te /
T02D2488:228b-0: thabs dang shes @228b rab kyi dbus su rang gi yi ger bsdus la /
T02D2488:228b-1: rang gi de nyid kyi thugs kar 'od zer dang bcas pas 'jug par bya'o //
T02D2488:228b-2: gzhan du na nyes pa dang bcas pa'o //
T02D2488:228b-3: de dag kyang tshogs pa la bshags te bsdam par bya'o //
T02D2488:228b-4: gzhan yang lta ba dang spyod pa nges par gnas pa la the tshom skye ba dang /
T02D2488:228b-5: theg pa gsum gyis gdul bya'i rim pa dang sbyar nas mi 'dul bar gcig tu sbyor ba dang /
T02D2488:228b-6: de kho na nyid bcu la mi gnas par dkyil 'khor dang slob ma smin par byed pa dang /
T02D2488:228b-7: bdud brtag pa'i thabs la mkhas par mi byed pa dang /
T02D2488:228b-8: rtsa ba dang yan lag gi sdom pa zhig gam
T02D2488:228b-9: ma zhig pa bsam par bya ba dus 'das pa
T02D2488:228b-10: dang / phra mo'i nyes byas kyang khyad du bsad
T02D2488:228b-11: nas ma bshags par dus 'das na dug chung yang
T02D2488:228b-12: rma la mched pa bzhin du dus 'das pas gzhi
T02D2488:228b-13: de nyid las 'phel ba yang tshad de nyid du
T02D2488:228b-14: dang / 'phel bas / de bas de dag kyang yan lag gi nyes pa'o //
T02D2488:228b-15: bla ma'i bka' dang bya ba byung ba dang /
T02D2488:228b-16: nab dang bar chad dang bcas pa dang /
T02D2488:228b-17: don chen po mthong ba la nyes pa med do //
T02D2488:228b-18: dri ma las ldang ba yang gong du bstan to //
T02D2488:228b-19: ltung ba'i rigs de dag kyang yul dang /
T02D2488:228b-21: rkyen gyi dbang dang sbyor ba'i bye brag gis lci
T02D2488:228b-22: yad la sogs pa bzhag ste yul las ni yul
T02D2488:228b-25: des rtogs shing khong du chud pa dang /
T02D2488:228b-28: dus dang bsam pa las ched du bsams pa dang /
T02D2488:228b-30: rkyen gyis ni nad dang 'jigs pa la sogs pa'i bar chad med pa dang /
T02D2488:228b-31: 'gro ba gzhan la sogs pa'i dgos pa ma mthong ba'o //
T02D2488:228b-32: sbyor bas ni lus kyi bya ba dang /
T02D2488:228b-34: de dag gis ni dngos gzhir 'gyur ba'o //
T02D2488:228b-35: gzhan du ci rigs pa'i nyes pa'o //
T02D2488:228b-36: nyes pa de dag kun gyi thun mong du dbang dang ldan pa kun la shes par bya'o //
T02D2488:228b-37: de dag las dri ma las ldang ba yang sbyor ba chung ba dang /
T02D2488:228b-38: de nyid kyis nyes par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2488:228b-39: rang nyid kyis ldang bar nus pa dang /
T02D2488:228b-41: dur khrod la sogs par ni bdag nyid cho ga
T02D2488:228b-42: dang ldan pas byin gyis brlabs kyis ldang bar bya
T02D2488:228b-44: cho ga rdzogs pas rnam par spyad //
T02D2488:228b-45: yon tan phyogs kyis rnam par 'phel //
T02D2488:228b-46: mig gis rnam par brgyan byas la //
T02D2488:229a-2: de dkyil ri bong brgyad pa'i gzhi //
T02D2488:229a-3: dang po'i lnga pas mdzes pas 'dzag / tshes la ri bong can gyis brgyan //
T02D2488:229a-4: sgra yig de nyid thig les mdzes //
T02D2488:229a-5: bcu drug phyed pa brgyad kyi 'og / dbang po'i phyogs kyis rnam par 'phel //
T02D2488:229a-6: rig byed lnga pas thabs kyis mdzes //
T02D2488:229a-7: yang na steng 'og dbang po yin //
T02D2488:229a-8: bcu drug phyed phyed thig le dbri //
T02D2488:229a-9: thig le las kyang rnam par 'das //
T02D2488:229a-10: thig le rnam par rdzogs par ldan //
T02D2488:229a-11: sgra yig dang po yon tan ldan //
T02D2488:229a-12: srog dang rtsol ba rnams bsdams nas //
T02D2488:229a-14: mkhas pas rim bzhin rnam par spyang //
T02D2488:229a-15: zhes bya ba 'di dag gis kyang dri ma las ldang bar bshad pa'o //
T02D2488:229a-16: da ni ltung ba la sogs pa thams cad kyang
T02D2488:229a-17: chu tshod nas brtsis nas rim pas dri ma las
T02D2488:229a-18: ldang ngo // gzhan du na yan lag gi nyes pas sdug bsngal 'thob po zhes pa'o //
T02D2488:229a-19: yan lag gi nyes pa'i rnam par bshad pa'o /
T02D2488:229a-21: // / de nas de'i 'bras bu'i thabs dang shes rab
T02D2488:229a-22: kyi rgyud mang po nas 'byung ba bshad par bya
T02D2488:229a-24: dang ldan the tshom dman mi mos //
T02D2488:229a-25: tshul bzhin cho ga ldan pa ni //
T02D2488:229a-26: mngon sum rdo rje sems dpa' ste //
T02D2488:229a-27: mchog dang thun mong rgyas par 'gyur //
T02D2488:229a-29: dad ldan zhes pas dad pa dang ldan pa dngos
T02D2488:229a-30: grub kyi snod du bzhag pas kun gyi thun mong
T02D2488:229a-32: dad pa med pa la dngos grub 'byung bar mi 'gyur te /
T02D2488:229a-33: de'i phyir dad pa dang ldan pa'i gang zag la rang bzhin gyis dngos grub 'grub /
T02D2488:229a-34: ji ltar dang ba'i snod du yang //
T02D2488:229a-35: rtog med zla ba'i gzugs brnyan 'char //
T02D2488:229a-36: dad pa dkar po'i gzhi rten yin //
T02D2488:229a-37: dad pa med pa'i mi rnams la //
T02D2488:229a-38: dkar po'i lo tog mi skye ste //
T02D2488:229a-39: sa bon me yis tshig pa la //
T02D2488:229a-40: myu gu sngon po mi 'byung bzhin//
T02D2488:229a-41: zhes bshad pas snying rje dang shes rab dang brtson
T02D2488:229a-42: 'grus kyis grogs byas pa'i gzhan gyi don gnyer bar
T02D2488:229a-43: 'dod pa'i rnal 'byor pas bsten par bya'o zhes bshad
T02D2488:229a-44: par bya'o // the tshom yod pa ni yid gnyis za ba'o //
T02D2488:229a-45: de yang thabs shes rab kyi rgyud mang po las
T02D2488:229b-0: grub pa'i mtha' @229b sna tshogs su brtags pa 'di
T02D2488:229b-1: dag 'gal ba mi srid pas don dang bcas pa
T02D2488:229b-2: dang don med par 'gyur ro zhes rtog pa de
T02D2488:229b-3: dag kyang / don de dag khong du chud pa ste /
T02D2488:229b-4: thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud de dag ji ltar dpag bsam gyi shing dang 'dra bas /
T02D2488:229b-5: nges kyang skyes bu mang po'i 'dod pa cha shas kyi bye brag gis kyang bsgrub par nus te /
T02D2488:229b-6: dngos po mtha' dag gis grub pa ni ma yin no //
T02D2488:229b-7: spros pa bral ba gnyis su med pa'i ye shes
T02D2488:229b-8: kyi ngo bo la rtog pa med pa'i tshul du
T02D2488:229b-9: gus pa dang bcas pa'i grub pa'i mtha' de dag
T02D2488:229b-10: kun gyi rtog pa med pa'i tshul du 'gal bar
T02D2488:229b-11: ga la 'gyur / de'i phyir rtags kyi cha'i nus
T02D2488:229b-12: par byin gyis brlabs pa'i rten cing 'brel par 'byung
T02D2488:229b-13: ba re re la 'jug pas slu ba med pa'i
T02D2488:229b-14: don dang yang phrad par 'gyur ro //
T02D2488:229b-15: de'i phyir bshad pa'i rgyud chen po las /
T02D2488:229b-16: nam mkha'i snying po khyod nyon cig / gnyis med ye shes don ldan pa'i //
T02D2488:229b-17: nga dang 'dra ba'i rgyud kun la //
T02D2488:229b-18: yid bzhin nor bu dpag bsam shing //
T02D2488:229b-19: bum pa bzang po 'dra bar ni //
T02D2488:229b-20: gus pas tshul bzhin gnas pa la //
T02D2488:229b-21: gcig kyang thabs kyi bye brag gis //
T02D2488:229b-22: nus pa bsam gyis mi khyab ste //
T02D2488:229b-23: de lta de ltar de bzhin bsgrub //
T02D2488:229b-24: cho ga nyams pas 'grub pa'ang min //
T02D2488:229b-25: zhes bshad pa 'di ni tshul de dag las tha
T02D2488:229b-26: dad pa'i sgo nas 'bras bu dang ldan pa yang
T02D2488:229b-27: mngon sum du 'grub pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2488:229b-29: lha dang drang srong bden pa'i ngag / gang la sbyor ba'i nus pa yang //
T02D2488:229b-30: slu bar byed pa ma mthong na //
T02D2488:229b-31: ye shes chags pa mi mnga' ba'i //
T02D2488:229b-32: smon lam snying rjes gzhan don 'jug / thams cad mkhyen pas smos ci dgos //
T02D2488:229b-33: zhes bshad pas de la brtag par mi bya'o //
T02D2488:229b-34: 'on kyang skyes bu dam pa nye bar brten pa
T02D2488:229b-35: dang bral bas 'dod pa dang bral bar 'dod pa
T02D2488:229b-37: nga rgyal gyis non pas zhugs pa rnams ni rtags
T02D2488:229b-38: 'khrul pas don dang phrad par byed pa ma yin
T02D2488:229b-40: slob dpon las ni dngos grub 'thob //
T02D2488:229b-41: ces bya ba la sogs pas rgya cher bshad do //
T02D2488:229b-42: gzhan yang de lta bu'i dbang du mdzad nas /
T02D2488:229b-43: lung ma rtogs par rtog ge yi //
T02D2488:229b-44: chos rnams rnam par gnas ma yin //
T02D2488:230a-2: de yang lung ni sngon du btang //
T02D2488:230a-3: long ba'i rkang pas tshod dpag shing //
T02D2488:230a-4: nyam nga'i g-yang sar rgyug byed pa //
T02D2488:230a-5: rjes su dpag la gtsor 'dzin pa //
T02D2488:230a-6: rnam par ltung bar dka' ma yin //
T02D2488:230a-7: zhes bshad pas de ni 'gal bar 'gyur ro //
T02D2488:230a-8: dman pa la mi mos pa ni nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas la smod pa dang bral ba'o //
T02D2488:230a-9: gzhan yang skyes bu tshe 'di 'bras bu 'dod pa
T02D2488:230a-10: la phyi ma'i tshe la 'byung bar mi 'gyur ro
T02D2488:230a-11: // skyes bu phyi ma la 'dod pa 'di la yang rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2488:230a-12: mchog 'dod pa la thun mong yang rgyas par 'gyur ro //
T02D2488:230a-13: thun mong la mos pa la mchog dang de nyid kyang thob par mi 'gyur ro ;
T02D2488:230a-14: / dngos grub rab dang 'bring dang ha ma yang rim pas thob par 'gyur ro //
T02D2488:230a-16: drug cu pa yi stsol pa yis //
T02D2488:230a-17: s'a lu'i 'bras dang phrad ma yin //
T02D2488:230a-18: dman la mos pa'i sbyor ba yis //
T02D2488:230a-19: mchog rnams thob par ga la 'gyur //
T02D2488:230a-21: tshul bzhin cho ga ldan pa ni //
T02D2488:230a-22: zhes bshad pa yang tshul bzhin cho ga ldan pa
T02D2488:230a-23: ni thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud las gang yang
T02D2488:230a-24: rung ba'i grub pa'i mtha'i cho ga dang ldan pa'o
T02D2488:230a-25: // de'i phyir rgyud mang ba dang grub pa'i mtha'i tshul thams cad du bdag gis bshad pa ste /
T02D2488:230a-26: kun gyi thun mong ma yin pa'i phyir ro //
T02D2488:230a-27: de bas na dgongs pa'i don la mkhas pas brtag par mi bya'o //
T02D2488:230a-28: mngon sum rdo rje sems dpa' de ni dam tshig dang ldan pa dang /
T02D2488:230a-29: spyod pa la gnas pa rkyen gzhan gyis 'gal bar mi 'gyur ba'i phyir ro //
T02D2488:230a-30: mchog dang thun mong rgyas par 'gyur zhes bshad pas 'bras bu rgyas par bstan te /
T02D2488:230a-31: thun mong brgyad la sogs pa dang rdo rje 'dzin pa'i sa thob pa'o ;
T02D2488:230a-33: rtog pa thams cad shes rab tu shes pas //
T02D2488:230a-34: dngos po sgyu 'dra bsdam bya sdom byed med //
T02D2488:230a-35: rang bzhin gnas dang gzhan gyi nus pa bskyed //
T02D2488:230a-36: ngo bo nyid dang bsdam bya sdom byed dang //
T02D2488:230a-37: rtsa ba yan lag de bzhin yan lag go //
T02D2488:230a-38: rdo rje sems sogs bde gshegs ma lus kyang //
T02D2488:230a-39: de la 'da' bar spyod pa ma yin na //
T02D2488:230a-40: mi 'dod dngos po thams cad sreg par byed //
T02D2488:230a-41: sdug bsngal sna tshogs rnams kyi gzhi rtsa ste //
T02D2488:230a-42: bde gshegs kun gyis bu bzhin rab dgongs nas //
T02D2488:230a-43: sku gsum ye shes chu yi zla ba bzhin //
T02D2488:230a-44: nad med nor dang rkang 'gro mang po 'phel //
T02D2488:230b-1: rgyal po la sogs gsong por smra byed cing //
T02D2488:230b-2: skye bo mang pos rtag tu bkur bar 'gyur //
T02D2488:230b-3: 'khor dang longs spyod mang pos rnam par mdzas //
T02D2488:230b-4: rims dang gdon la sogs pa'i gnod pa rnams //
T02D2488:230b-5: bla ma mkha' 'gro dam tshig rjes dran pas //
T02D2488:230b-6: de dag las kyang myur du thar bar 'gyur //
T02D2488:230b-7: rin thang med pa'i rin chen rnams kyang 'thob //
T02D2488:230b-8: gdon dang mkha' 'gro rnams kyis 'bar bar mthong //
T02D2488:230b-9: rdo rje 'chang ba mang pos rjes su 'brang //
T02D2488:230b-10: byang chub sems dpa' mang pos sbun bzhin dgongs //
T02D2488:230b-11: sngags dang zhing las skyes pa'i mkha' 'gros kyang //
T02D2488:230b-12: rgyang nas gzigs shing dngos grub ster bar byed //
T02D2488:230b-13: 'jig rten skyong ba rnams kyis rtag tu skyog / gdug pa can rnams mthong nas dga' bar byed //
T02D2488:230b-14: 'bad pa med par gsungs pa'i las rnams 'grub //
T02D2488:230b-15: bskal pa mang por sdom la gnas pa bas //
T02D2488:230b-16: skad cig gnas pas 'bras bu rdzogs par byed //
T02D2488:230b-17: ldog pa med pa'i byang chub sems bzung nas //
T02D2488:230b-18: thabs kyis bsod nams tshogs ni rab rdzogs byed //
T02D2488:230b-19: bde ba'i ngag can de ni lung bstan te //
T02D2488:230b-20: brtags pa rnams log bden pa'i don mthong nas //
T02D2488:230b-21: sa nas sar 'phar mi mthun phyogs spangs te //
T02D2488:230b-22: sgyu ma lta bus rtog med mnyam par gnas //
T02D2488:230b-23: kha sbyor bde chen mtshan gyis rnam brgyan pa //
T02D2488:230b-24: stobs dang mi 'jigs phyogs kyi chos rnams dang //
T02D2488:230b-25: pha rol phyin pas sa dang dbang la sogs //
T02D2488:230b-26: dag pa'i zhing du rtag par tshogs chen bskor //
T02D2488:230b-27: 'dul ba'i don du snang ba 'gag pa med //
T02D2488:230b-28: legs par mtshan pa'i rgyan gyis gar yang gnas //
T02D2488:230b-29: dus las yol med dang ba'i chu zla bzhin //
T02D2488:230b-30: 'bad rtsol rtog med yid bzhin nor bu ltar //
T02D2488:230b-31: smon lam grub pas thugs rje 'gag pa min //
T02D2488:230b-32: longs spyod chen pos mnyam pa nyid la gnas //
T02D2488:230b-33: 'dod pa'i yon tan grub pas 'gag pa med //
T02D2488:230b-34: sdom ldan rnams la mngon sum gnas zhes bshad //
T02D2488:230b-35: ces bshad pa yang thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud
T02D2488:230b-36: mang po las 'bras bu mang du bshad pas bdag
T02D2488:230b-37: gis mdor bsdus te bshad pa'o //
T02D2488:230b-38: bskal pa mang por tshogs bsags nas //
T02D2488:230b-39: rin chen snod du bdud rtsi 'dzag / rtag tu brtson par mi byed par //
T02D2488:231a-2: zhes bshad pas kyang don de nyid grub par bstan te /
T02D2488:231a-3: bskal pa mang po nas rgyud shin tu sbyangs pa dang /
T02D2488:231a-5: smon lam las grub pas rin po che'i snod lta
T02D2488:231a-6: bur gyur pa'i nang du bdud rtsi 'thung bar mi
T02D2488:231a-7: byed pa'i 'dod pa'i thag pas bcings nas /
T02D2488:231a-8: nyon mongs pa'i dug gis myos par byed ces bshad do //
T02D2488:231a-9: de'i phyir lam 'di lta bu ni shin tu thob
T02D2488:231a-10: par dka' pa'i lam ni rtag par bsten par bya
T02D2488:231a-11: ba dang / theg pa chen po shes rab kyi
T02D2488:231a-12: pha rol tu phyin pa thob pa rnams kyang phyir
T02D2488:231a-14: de nyid kyang thob par dka' ba yang ;
T02D2488:231a-15: sangs rgyas rnams la bkur sti byas //
T02D2488:231a-16: de las dge ba'i rtsa ba bskrun //
T02D2488:231a-17: dge ba'i bshes kyis mgon byas pa //
T02D2488:231a-18: 'di mnyan pa yi snod yin no //
T02D2488:231a-20: de bas na gus pa dang bcas pas thob par dka' ba'i lam 'di rtag par bstan par bya'o //
T02D2488:231a-21: thabs dang shes rab kyi rgyud mang po las 'byung
T02D2488:231a-22: ba'i sdom pa'i 'bras bu rnam par bshad pa mdor
T02D2488:231a-24: / de bas na rtsod pa'i dus kyi gang zag
T02D2488:231a-25: nyon mongs pas rgyud 'khrugs pa sdom pa dang dam
T02D2488:231a-26: tshig la gnas pa dka' ba ste /
T02D2488:231a-27: de'i dus su sdom pa dang dam tshig la gnas
T02D2488:231a-28: te mnyam par bzhag nas skad cig tsam bsgoms pas
T02D2488:231a-29: kyang dus gzhan du bskal par gnas pa bas don
T02D2488:231a-31: de yang rtsod pa'i dus kyi gang zag gi mtshan
T02D2488:231a-32: nyid bcom ldan 'das kyis dam pa dang po'i rgyud
T02D2488:231a-34: rtsod pa'i dus kyi 'dzam bu gling gi mi rnams
T02D2488:231a-35: ni lhag par yang sdig pa'i las la gzhol zhing
T02D2488:231a-36: / tshe thung zhing shes rab zhen te /
T02D2488:231a-37: rdo rje slob dpon gang yin pa dag kyang dge ba'i rtsa ba la log par gzhol ba dang /
T02D2488:231a-38: dge slong rnams kyang mi dge ba bcu byed pa la gzhol ba dang /
T02D2488:231a-39: khyim pa rnams kyang dkon mchog gsum gyi yo byad la longs spyod par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2488:231a-40: mkhas pa rnams kyang ma thos pa'i rgyud 'chad cing
T02D2488:231a-41: mngon pa'i nga rgyal gyis rgyud kyi 'grel pa byas
T02D2488:231a-42: nas / don phyin ci log tu bstan pas dmyal bar gzhol bar 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2488:231b-0: grong mi rmongs pa @231b rnams kyang log par dad
T02D2488:231b-1: pas thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal mtshan rnams sun phyung
T02D2488:231b-2: nas / khyim pa la bsnyen bkur byed par 'gyur ba dang /
T02D2488:231b-3: slob ma rnams kyang zhe sdang gi blos slob dpon gyi skyon rtog pa dang /
T02D2488:231b-4: longs spyod la chags nas slob dpon dam pa ma
T02D2488:231b-5: yin pa la yang bstod cing mchod par 'gyur la
T02D2488:231b-6: / bla ma'i bsnyen bkur sangs rgyas kyis gsungs pa rnams ni byed par mi 'gyur zhing /
T02D2488:231b-7: 'chad pa po rnams ni mi dge ba bcu la 'jug par 'gyur zhing /
T02D2488:231b-8: sgrub pa po rnams kyang bza' btung la chags par byed pa dang /
T02D2488:231b-9: bud med rnams kyang 'dod pa la shin tu chags so zhes gsungs so //
T02D2488:231b-10: gzhan yang mngon pa'i bstan bcos las bstan pa ni srol gong ma bzhin zhes bshad do //
T02D2488:231b-11: de'i phyir rnal 'byor pas 'bad par bya'o zhes rjes su gdams pa'o //
T02D2488:231b-12: sna tshogs rgyud dang theg chen mdo //
T02D2488:231b-13: dam pa kun gyi dgongs pa dang ;
T02D2488:231b-14: / gzhan sogs gzhung lugs mang po las //
T02D2488:231b-16: rgya cher 'grel pa'i dri ma med //
T02D2488:231b-17: lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba'i //
T02D2488:231b-18: bla ma brgyud dang lhan cig skyes //
T02D2488:231b-19: dad dang snying rje gtsor byas pas //
T02D2488:231b-20: sna tshogs rgyud dang slob dpon gyi //
T02D2488:231b-21: dgongs pa sna tshogs brtags pa las //
T02D2488:231b-22: ngal las dge ba gang thob des //
T02D2488:231b-23: 'das sogs bla ma rdo rje spun //
T02D2488:231b-24: dam tshig ma lus nyams pa gang //
T02D2488:231b-25: bla ma 'jam bcas mdun byas te //
T02D2488:231b-26: bdag sogs dam tshig dag gyur cig / thams cad dngos grub snod gyur la //
T02D2488:231b-27: thun mong mchog gis rnam brgyan te //
T02D2488:231b-28: 'gro kun rdo rje 'dzin gyur cig / rdo rje
T02D2488:231b-29: theg pa'i rtsa ba'i ltung ba'i rgya cher 'grel pa
T02D2488:231b-30: lam gyi sgron ma zhes bya ba de la phan
T02D2488:231b-31: par byed pa'i yan lag dang bcas pa slob dpon
T02D2488:231b-32: 'jam dpal grags pas mdzad pa rdzogs so /
T02D2488:231b-34: // / myang ro stag tshal du d'i pam ka ra bod du byon tsam na bsgyur /
T02D2488:231b-35: pu ri sha'i grong khyer du a'a ts'arya au pa dha shr'i badzra sh'i la dang /
T02D2488:231b-36: lo ts'a ba dge slong brtson 'grus seng ges legs par mnos te gus par bsgyur ba'o /
T02D2488:231b-38: // / bal po'i khyim du du ma'i lo //
T02D2488:231b-39: rin chen grags pa bdag gis 'ongs //
T02D2488:231b-40: 'grel dpe rnying pa la yang gtugs //
